content: good karma cowl by cally monster yarn emma s yarn super silky 80% superwash merino/20% silk 400yards/100grams color 1 c1 after party 325 yards practically perfect smalls 80% superwash merino/20% nylon 81yards/20grams color 2 c2 -trendy af 50 yards color 3 c3 -set sail 50 yards needles us4/3 5mm 24 circular needles notions 3 stitch marker tapestry needle t-pins and for blocking gauge 24 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette stitch after gentle blocking although gauge is not crucial for this project it will affect the finished size and yarn requirements a looser gauge will result in the use of more yarn finished size 20 neck opening after blocking © 2023 monsterknits for personal non-commercial use only all rights reserved p age | 2 knit knit m stitch marker when working a slip_stitch it purl purl m1r make 1 right pick is important that you do not up the bar between the pfb purl into the front pull the yarn tight otherwise stitches from back to the and back of stitch the stitches will bunch and front knit into front pucker sl1wyif slip 1 stitch +1st c1 c2 c3 - before row purlwise with yarn in m1l make 1 left pick instruction indicates working front up the bar between the yarn for that row sl1wyib slip one with stitches from front to yarn in back back knit into back +1st pm place stitch marker let s get started row 2 c1- k to center stitch p1 k to last stitch garter tab cast on sl1wyif using size 4/3 5mm needles and c1 >join c2 cast on 3 sts row 1 rs knit row 2 ws k2 sl1wyif row 3 c2- k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last 3 sts m1l k2 sl1wyif 91 sts >repeat row 1-2 five more times then work row 1 once turn 90 degrees pick up and knit 5 sts row 4 c2- k to center stitch p1 k to last stitch then pick up and knit the 3 cast on sts which will sl1wyif end with the slipped stitch 11 sts >cut c2 set-up ws sl1wyif k2 p2 pm p1 pm p2 k2 row 5 c1- k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last 3 sl1wyif sts m1l k2 sl1wyif 95 sts slip markers as you come to them row 6 c1- k to center stitch p1 k to last stitch sl1wyif stockinette - using c1 work row 1-2 eighteen >join c3 times +72 sts ending with 83 sts row 7 c3- k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last 3 row 1 rs k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last sts m1l k2 sl1wyif 99 sts 3 sts m1l k2 sl1wyif row 8 c3- k to center stitch p1 k to last stitch row 2 ws k3 p to last 3 sts k2 sl1wyif sl1wyif >cut c3 garter stripes tip -
